pages.text: $(li)Shulkers are box-shapped hostile creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/end_city)End Cities$(/l).$(br)$(li)Shulkers occasionally shoots you with projectiles that follow you until hit you.$(br)$(li)With this, you will receive the $(l)Levitate$() effect, making you to float until the effect dissapears.
They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/shulker_shell)Shulker Shells$(/l) upon death.
